items.question: What is Islamful?
items.answer: Islamful is an all-in-one Islamic tools platform that provides prayer times, a halal/haram checker, Quran reader, dua collection, dhikr counter, and more — all free to use on the web. Think of it as your complete Islamic companion for daily worship and Islamic living.

items.question: How accurate are the prayer times?
items.answer: Our prayer times are powered by the Aladhan API, which supports multiple calculation methods including ISNA, MWL, Egyptian, and Umm Al-Qura. You can choose the method used by your local mosque or Islamic authority for the most accurate times in your area.

items.question: How does the Haram Checker work?
items.answer: The Haram Checker lets you search for food items, ingredients, or products to find out whether they are halal, haram, or doubtful (mashbooh) according to Islamic guidelines. Each result includes an explanation and references to help you make informed decisions.

items.question: Is Islamful free to use?
items.answer: Yes. All core tools on Islamful are completely free. We believe every Muslim should have easy access to essential Islamic tools without barriers. We sustain the platform through ethical advertising and optional premium features.

items.question: What tools are coming next?
items.answer: We are actively building a Quran reader with translations and tafsir, a comprehensive dua collection, a dhikr counter, the 99 Names of Allah with audio, an Islamic (Hijri) calendar, and a zakat calculator. Follow us for updates as we launch each tool.
